reviews.content: Very good tweak, but wish there were more animations
Black screen and can’t do anything with the device

Keeps saying it cannot connect to server. 
Raise to wake function is still partially broken. 
Other than that, fantastic tweak with a lot of hard work put in!
Works as it should, but uses way more battery than advertised. Don’t waste your money if you don’t have a mega battery case
Awesome tweak, just watch out for battery life
Phone might randomly wake up. Notchless also doesn’t play well with it. Notchless still shows up even when the disable in pocket option is on.
Won’t stay activated on lockscreen iOS 13.5 iPhone pro max

This is a great tweak! The only complaint I have is that it takes a bit longer to wake my phone because the AOD fades away and then the LS fades in, and often lags while doing this. I would like for it to do this the way that SimpleLS2 does.

‪Works perfectly in my iPhone XS Max iOS 12.1.1 ‬
‪Chimera 1.3.8‬
‪Sileo 1.4.1‬
‪Sileo beta ( Channel ) 1.5.0b1‬
‪Zebra 1.0~beta22-2 ‬

One issue ???
Makes my iPhone get hot and hot
Awesome but def will kill your battery if it’s always on.
